actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to persons whose small businesses are displaced by Federal and federally assisted programs so they may lease, rent, or buy replacement quarters.

summary.text: Requires that the heads of Federal agencies make payments to owners of small businesses who are displaced from their place of business as a result of Federal or federally assisted programs. States that such payment shall be the amount necessary, up to $4,000, to enable such displaced person to lease, rent, or make a downpayment on a decent, safe, and sanitary place of business. Stipulates that in the case of a downpayment exceeding $2,000, the displaced person must equally match any amount over $2,000 in making the payment.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance to persons whose small businesses are displaced by Federal and federally assisted programs so they may lease, rent, or buy replacement quarters.
